definition: to seek by inquiry or search/to call on/to visit
to explore/to search out/to scout/to visit/to stretch forward
to visit/to call on/to seek/to inquire/to investigate

sentences.english: Brenda Lee, a staff member of Oxfam Hong Kong, recently visited Nepal on a documentation trip.
sentences.chinese: 李冰心为乐施会职员，最近探访尼泊尔以作文件纪录。

sentences.english: Slylock Fox is visiting Miss Fox's fifth-grade class on Career Day.
sentences.chinese: 狐狸侦探在求职日探访了狐狸老师五年级的学生。

sentences.english: Other books can also be useful for the next visit to the wine store.
sentences.chinese: 还有些书对那些希望探访酒庄的人有用。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effect of home follow-up to the quality of life of primiparas during puerperium.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨家庭探访对初产妇产褥期生活质量的影响。

sentences.english: At nighttime I would have strange visitations that filled me with fear.
sentences.chinese: 夜晚，可怕的奇怪的探访充斥我的脑海。

sentences.english: Regular hand washing should be carried out after caring for or visiting sick people.
sentences.chinese: 照顾或探访病人后应照例洗手。

sentences.english: I have noticed that you do not visit Frau Schmitz.
sentences.chinese: 我注意到您没探访过施密兹夫人。

sentences.english: Could he have been on the way to a visit?
sentences.chinese: 当时他是在去探访这所房屋的路上吗？

sentences.english: Some churches send out workers to visit monthly.
sentences.chinese: 因此一些教会差派同工每月去探访他们。

sentences.english: I particularly cherished my visits with military families all across the country.
sentences.chinese: 我特别珍视我在全国各地探访那些军人家庭的经历。

sentences.english: LJ faces Lincoln through the cage in the visitation room.
sentences.chinese: LJ和Lincoln在探访室的铁笼面对面坐着。

sentences.english: Cornel University is the third college I visited in New York.
sentences.chinese: 康奈尔大学是我在纽约探访的第三所大学。

sentences.english: The cultures visited by the Galactic Maya were shamanic.
sentences.chinese: 这个被银河的玛雅人探访的文明是萨满教的。

sentences.english: I started at the downtown campus of Metropolitan Community College.
sentences.chinese: 我首先探访了市区的大都会社区大学。

sentences.english: Members who failed to visit the claimant were fined $1.[9]
sentences.chinese: 未探访该申领人的委员会成员会被罚扣1美元。

sentences.english: The professor came to visit us, so they recorded their reflections on that day.
sentences.chinese: 教授有一次来探访我们，孩子们记录下了那天的感受。

definition: to interview people on the spot/to go around and make inquiries
to explore a mystery/to probe the unknown
to have a taste of/to realize/to appreciate
to leave for/to proceed towards/to go
to collect local cultural material (recording folk songs, taking photos etc)
